TopicTitle: I should probably make an ello thread now that I got the game

Articles.Content:
Been looking at the game for the past few weeks, finnaly got on the forum, and now am a proud owner of the game!

If you ever need a test rat, im the one to call

Been looking at the game for the past few weeks, finnaly got on the forum, and now am a proud owner of the game!

If you ever need a test rat, im the one to call

Hey, if you want to be a tester go to your profile, click on 'modify profile' then go to the groups page, and send in a request to join the tester group. Welcome to the forums and I am sure that we will enjoy to have a new member here.

Hey, if you want to be a tester go to your profile, click on 'modify profile' then go to the groups page, and send in a request to join the tester group. Welcome to the forums and I am sure that we will enjoy to have a new member here.

Isent that over now?

guess Ill try....

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The test team application period has closed.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

and now am a proud owner of the game!

Congratz!

Shaun.
